channel.title: How to record xbox 360 movies with pc extender
channel.description: recently me and my friends have been trying to record movies on our xbox 360's (movies like Red vs Blue)and we are stumped and we really neeed some help so im comin to yuo guys . pleese help. ive tried using a DVR and a regular camera and the quality on them suks horribly so those 2 options are out.

yea at ^ comment, for some reason when i try it, the recording always has random black lines across the screen
